scripts.title: The Fed News Everyone Scrolled Past
scripts.hook: Stop scrolling. This affects YOUR wallet.

segments.visual: Direct to camera, hand gesture to stop
segments.audio: Stop scrolling. The Fed just made a decision that affects your wallet.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Medium shot of professional man in his early 30s in casual button-down shirt, looking directly at camera with slight urgency, hand raised in 'stop' gesture, home office background with warm natural lighting, shallow depth of field, slight camera push-in, 4K cinematic quality

segments.visual: News headline graphics, then back to camera
segments.audio: They kept interest rates at three-point-five to three-point-seven-five percent. And I know what you're thinking—'That's Wall Street stuff.' But here's why you should care.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Animated motion graphic of news headlines floating across screen transitioning to Federal Reserve building exterior, professional news style with blue and gold color scheme, text overlays showing '3.5% - 3.75%', clean modern typography, smooth 3D camera movement

segments.visual: Split screen: house icon / savings account / credit card
segments.audio: Your mortgage rate? Tied to this. Your savings account interest? Tied to this. That credit card you're trying to pay off? Yep, tied to this too.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Clean animated infographic with three icons appearing sequentially: stylized house with percentage symbol, piggy bank with dollar signs floating up, credit card with interest rate meter, dark blue background with soft gradient, each icon pulses as mentioned, smooth transitions between elements, modern flat design style

segments.audio: Here's the real talk for Triangle families. If you've got ten thousand in a high-yield savings account earning four percent, that's four hundred a year. Rates drop? You're looking at three-fifty or less. But that fifteen thousand on a credit card at twenty-two percent? That's costing you two-seventy-five every single month.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Over-the-shoulder shot of hands using a financial calculator on a clean desk, numbers appearing as floating holographic elements above the calculator, warm office lighting, comparison graphics materializing showing $10,000 savings versus $15,000 debt scenarios, subtle camera drift, professional corporate style with green for savings and red for debt

segments.audio: The Fed's decisions matter. But your behavior with money? That matters way more. Focus on paying down high-interest debt first. The math doesn't lie.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Medium close-up of presenter speaking with conviction, slight lean forward showing engagement, natural window light creating soft key light on face, blurred bookshelf and plant in background, warm color grade suggesting approachability, subtle handheld camera movement for authenticity

segments.audio: Want to look at your specific numbers? Link in my bio for a free consultation. No pressure, just math.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Presenter gestures toward camera with open palm, friendly smile, then smooth transition to end card with modern animated text 'Free Consultation - Link in Bio', clean white and blue design, subtle particle effects, professional but warm aesthetic, logo reveal at end

scripts.filming_notes: Film in home office. Casual but professional vibe. Speak with urgency at hook, then settle into conversational tone. Hand gestures help with engagement.
b_roll_prompts: Aerial drone shot slowly ascending over Raleigh NC downtown skyline, golden hour lighting, mix of modern buildings and suburban homes visible in distance, warm color grade
Close-up of hands typing on laptop showing a banking app with interest rates visible, soft focus background, natural daylight, modern minimalist desk setup
Abstract motion graphic of dollar bills transforming into percentage symbols, flowing upward motion, clean dark background with green accent lighting, smooth particle effects
Wide shot of typical suburban Triangle neighborhood with families in yards, late afternoon sun, peaceful community atmosphere, slight camera pan right to left
scripts.disclaimer: This content is for educational purposes only and does not constitute financial advice.

scripts.title: Two Rate Cuts Coming in 2026?
scripts.hook: Analysts are predicting TWO rate cuts this year.

segments.visual: Hold up two fingers, direct eye contact
segments.audio: Analysts are predicting two rate cuts in twenty-twenty-six. Here's what that means for you.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Tight medium shot of presenter holding up two fingers emphatically, direct eye contact with camera, confident expression, casual professional attire, clean home office background slightly out of focus, warm natural lighting from side window, subtle camera push forward

segments.visual: Animated timeline graphic showing rate cuts
segments.audio: The Fed just held rates steady at three-point-five percent. But the projection? One cut in the first half of the year, another cut later. If that happens, a few things change.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Sleek animated timeline stretching across screen, 2026 calendar months appearing with markers dropping at two points indicating rate cuts, rates displayed as descending steps from 3.75% down to 3.25%, professional blue and white color scheme, smooth camera track along timeline, modern data visualization style

segments.visual: Split visual: savings account dropping, loan rates ticking down
segments.audio: Your savings account? That four percent APY might drop to three-point-five or lower. Your mortgage or car loan? Rates tick down slightly. Not dramatic, but noticeable.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Split screen animation: left side shows savings account interface with APY number animating downward from 4.0% to 3.5%, right side shows loan rate meter gradually decreasing, subtle red tint on savings side, subtle green on loan side, clean modern UI design, soft glow effects on changing numbers

segments.visual: Back to camera, gesturing with hands
segments.audio: Now here's the part most people miss. If you're saving money right now, you're locking in better returns than you might get next year. And if you're planning to pay down debt? Doing it before cuts keeps your payoff timeline clean.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Medium shot of presenter speaking animatedly with natural hand gestures emphasizing points, leaning slightly forward with engaged posture, bookshelf with financial books blurred in background, warm afternoon light, authentic documentary style with slight handheld movement

segments.audio: So what's your move? High-interest debt? Attack it now. Emergency fund? Keep building it. Thinking about buying a house? Stay ready and get pre-approved.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Animated checklist appearing item by item with satisfying checkmark animations, modern minimalist design with rounded rectangles, icons for each item (credit card, piggy bank, house key), dark background with items illuminating as they appear, smooth staggered reveal timing

segments.audio: Want to run the numbers for your situation? Link in bio. Let's look at your specific goals.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Close-up of presenter with warm genuine smile, natural eye contact, slight head tilt suggesting approachability, transition to clean end card with 'Link in Bio' text animating in, soft gradient background in blue-to-green, subtle floating particles, professional but friendly aesthetic

scripts.captions: On-screen: '2 RATE CUTS PROJECTED' | '4% → 3.5% savings' | 'Attack high-interest debt NOW'
scripts.filming_notes: More analytical tone for this one. Use the two-finger hook confidently. Good for audiences already following financial news.
b_roll_prompts: Close-up of Federal Reserve building facade with columns, dramatic low angle, cloudy sky, authoritative institutional feel, slight camera tilt up
Abstract data visualization of interest rate curve bending downward, glowing line chart on dark background, smooth animation with trailing particles, modern fintech aesthetic
Overhead shot of family reviewing paperwork at kitchen table, warm interior lighting, coffee cups visible, collaborative planning moment, soft natural colors
Time-lapse of suburban home exterior from dawn to dusk, showing full day cycle, warm golden hour emphasis, aspirational homeownership visual
scripts.disclaimer: This content is for educational purposes only and does not constitute financial advice.

scripts.title: The $75 Nobody Talks About
scripts.hook: Here's seventy-five dollars you might be losing.

segments.visual: Fan out $75 cash, then look at camera
segments.audio: Here's seventy-five dollars you might be losing and don't even know it.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Close-up of hands fanning out cash bills totaling approximately $75, crisp new bills, then quick cut to medium shot of presenter looking at camera with knowing expression, dramatic lighting with dark background spotlight effect, cinematic shallow depth of field

segments.audio: Let's do some quick math. Ten thousand dollars in a high-yield savings account at four-point-two-five percent? That's four hundred twenty-five dollars a year. But if rates drop to three-point-five percent? That same money earns three-fifty.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Animated calculator interface on screen, numbers typing in sequentially: 10000 x 0.0425 = 425, then morphing to 10000 x 0.035 = 350, clean white background with subtle grid pattern, numbers rendered in large bold typography, satisfying typing sound visualization ripples

segments.audio: That's seventy-five dollars. Gone. And that's just on ten thousand. The more you have saved, the bigger that gap gets.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Stylized $75 graphic floating in center of frame, slowly dissolving into particles that drift away, dark moody background with single spotlight, cinematic slow-motion feel, particles catching light as they disperse, melancholic but attention-grabbing visual

segments.visual: Back to camera, shift to positive energy
segments.audio: But here's the flip side most people ignore. The Fed holding rates means your savings account is STILL earning great interest. Right now. Money you contribute today locks in these higher rates. That's the opportunity.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Medium shot of presenter with energy shift from serious to optimistic, natural hand gestures, warm golden lighting suggesting positivity, slight camera movement creating dynamic feel, home office background with plant adding life, encouraging expression

segments.visual: Building blocks animation showing savings growing
segments.audio: Every dollar you put into that emergency fund right now is working harder than it might be next year. So if you've been putting off those contributions? Now's the time.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Abstract animation of coin stacks building upward like Tetris blocks, each block landing with satisfying effect, upward growing chart in background, optimistic blue and gold color palette, geometric modern style, slight camera pull-back revealing impressive tower of savings

segments.audio: Want to calculate exactly what your savings could earn? Free calculator, link in bio. Let's maximize what you've got.
segments.ai_visual_prompt: Presenter gestures toward phone showing calculator app, warm genuine smile, then smooth transition to branded end card with 'Free Calculator - Link in Bio' text, clean professional design with subtle animation, final logo placement, inviting call-to-action aesthetic

scripts.filming_notes: This hook works because it's specific and tangible. The $75 makes the abstract concrete. Energy shift at 25s is key—go from 'here's the problem' to 'here's why that's actually good news for you now.'
b_roll_prompts: Extreme close-up of cash being counted, crisp bills sliding through fingers, shallow depth of field, dramatic side lighting, ASMR-style satisfying visual
Abstract visualization of percentage numbers transforming and morphing, glowing digital aesthetic, dark background with neon accents, smooth fluid animation
Wide shot of young family playing in backyard of Triangle-area suburban home, warm late afternoon light, genuine happy moment, aspirational lifestyle visual
Animated piggy bank filling with coins, transparent view showing interior filling up, playful but sophisticated 3D render, soft studio lighting
scripts.disclaimer: This content is for educational purposes only and does not constitute financial advice.
